original_title: Catching a Killer: The Wind in the Willows Murder
overview: In Oxford, in a doorway to a house, a man lies dead. No suspects, no witnesses, no sign of forced entry. Like a real-life episode of Morse, Adrian Greenwood was an antique dealer stabbed over thirty times in his own home. The story may have the feel and look of a drama, but in reality somebodyâ€™s loved one has now been brutally murdered.
title: Catching a Killer: The Wind in the Willows Murder
